tool_description: Analyzes code quality using static analysis tools, checks coding standards, detects code smells, and provides improvement suggestions.

project_path.description: Path to the project directory to analyze

rules_config.description: Path to custom rules configuration file

include_patterns.description: File patterns to include in analysis

exclude_patterns.description: File patterns to exclude from analysis

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity level to report (info, warning, error, critical)

output_format.description: Format for the analysis report (json, xml, html, console)

error_messages: Project not found: The specified project path does not exist.
Invalid analysis scope: Scope must be full, changed_files, or specific_directory.
Rules config not found: The specified rules configuration file does not exist.
Invalid severity threshold: Threshold must be info, warning, error, or critical.
Invalid output format: Format must be json, xml, html, or console.
Analysis failed: Static analysis tools encountered errors during execution.
usage: Provide project_path and analysis_scope. Optionally specify rules_config, include/exclude patterns, severity_threshold, and output_format to customize the analysis.

issues_by_severity.description: Breakdown of issues by severity level

technical_debt.description: Estimated technical debt in time units

report_path.description: Path to the detailed analysis report file
